step_data.goal: Review the documentation in the Help section about creating merge requests

	[232] main ''
		[235] heading 'Merge requests (FREE)'
			[237] strong ''
				StaticText '(FREE)'
		[238] paragraph ''
			StaticText 'Merge requests (MRs) are the way you check source code changes into a branch. When you open a merge request, you can visualize and collaborate on the code changes before merge. Merge requests include:'
		[239] list ''
			[240] listitem ''
				ListMarker '•'
				StaticText 'A description of the request.'
			[241] listitem ''
				ListMarker '•'
				StaticText 'Code changes and inline code reviews.'
			[242] listitem ''
				ListMarker '•'
				StaticText 'Information about CI/CD pipelines.'
			[243] listitem ''
				ListMarker '•'
				StaticText 'A comment section for discussion threads.'
			[244] listitem ''
				ListMarker '•'
				StaticText 'The list of commits.'
		[245] paragraph ''
			StaticText 'Read more about'
			[246] link 'how to get started', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/help/user/project/merge_requests/getting_started.md'
			StaticText '.'
		[247] heading 'View merge requests'
		[249] paragraph ''
			StaticText 'You can view merge requests for your project, group, or yourself.'
		[250] heading 'View merge requests for a project'
		[252] paragraph ''
			StaticText 'To view all merge requests for a project:'
		[253] list ''
			[254] listitem ''
				ListMarker '0.'
				StaticText 'On the top bar, select'
				[255] strong ''
					StaticText 'Main menu > Projects'
				StaticText 'and find your project.'
			[256] listitem ''
				ListMarker '0.'
				StaticText 'On the left sidebar, select'
				[257] strong ''
					StaticText 'Merge requests'
				StaticText '.'
		[258] paragraph ''
			StaticText 'Or, to use a'
			[259] link 'keyboard shortcut', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/help/user/shortcuts.md'
			StaticText ', press'
			StaticText 'g'
			StaticText '+'
			StaticText 'm'
			StaticText '.'
		[262] heading 'View merge requests for all projects in a group'
		[264] paragraph ''
			StaticText 'To view merge requests for all projects in a group:'
		[265] list ''
			[266] listitem ''
				ListMarker '0.'
				StaticText 'On the top bar, select'
				[267] strong ''
					StaticText 'Main menu > Groups'
				StaticText 'and find your group.'
			[268] listitem ''
				ListMarker '0.'
				StaticText 'On the left sidebar, select'
				[269] strong ''
					StaticText 'Merge requests'
				StaticText '.'
		[270] paragraph ''
			StaticText 'If your group contains subgroups, this view also displays merge requests from the subgroup projects.'
		[271] heading 'View all merge requests assigned to you'
		[273] paragraph ''
			StaticText 'To view all merge requests assigned to you:'
		[274] list ''
			[275] listitem ''
				ListMarker '0.'
				StaticText 'On the top bar, put your cursor in the'
				[276] strong ''
					StaticText 'Search'
				StaticText 'box.'
			[277] listitem ''
				ListMarker '0.'
				StaticText 'From the dropdown list, select'
				[278] strong ''
					StaticText 'Merge requests assigned to me'
				StaticText '.'
		[279] paragraph ''
			StaticText 'or:'
		[280] list ''
			[281] listitem ''
				ListMarker '•'
				StaticText 'To use a'
				[282] link 'keyboard shortcut', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/help/user/shortcuts.md'
				StaticText ', press'
				StaticText 'Shift'
				StaticText '+'
				StaticText 'm'
				StaticText '.'
		[285] paragraph ''
			StaticText 'or:'
		[286] list ''
			[287] listitem ''
				ListMarker '0.'
				StaticText 'On the top bar, on the top right, select'
				[288] strong ''
					StaticText '{merge-request-open}'
				StaticText ''
				[289] strong ''
					StaticText 'Merge requests'
				StaticText '.'
			[290] listitem ''
				ListMarker '0.'
				StaticText 'From the dropdown list, select'
				[291] strong ''
					StaticText 'Assigned to you'
				StaticText '.'
		[292] heading 'Filter the list of merge requests'
		[294] paragraph ''
			StaticText 'To filter the list of merge requests:'
		[295] list ''
			[296] listitem ''
				ListMarker '0.'
				StaticText 'Above the list of merge requests, select'
				[297] strong ''
					StaticText 'Search or filter results...'
				StaticText '.'
			[298] listitem ''
				ListMarker '0.'
				StaticText 'In the dropdown list that appears, select the attribute you wish to filter by.'
			[299] listitem ''
				ListMarker '0.'
				StaticText 'Select or type the operator to use for filtering the attribute. The following operators are available:'
				[300] list ''
					[301] listitem ''
						ListMarker '◦'
						[302] code ''
							StaticText '='
						StaticText ': Is'
					[303] listitem ''
						ListMarker '◦'
						[304] code ''
							StaticText '!='
						StaticText ': Is not ('
						[305] link 'Introduced', url='https://gitlab.com/gitlab-org/gitlab/-/issues/18059'
						StaticText 'in GitLab 12.7)'
			[306] listitem ''
				ListMarker '0.'
				StaticText 'Enter the text to filter the attribute by. You can filter some attributes by'
				[307] strong ''
					StaticText 'None'
				StaticText 'or'
				[308] strong ''
					StaticText 'Any'
				StaticText '.'
			[309] listitem ''
				ListMarker '0.'
				StaticText 'Repeat this process to filter by multiple attributes. Multiple attributes are joined by a logical'
				[310] code ''
					StaticText 'AND'
				StaticText '.'
		[311] paragraph ''
			StaticText 'GitLab displays the results on-screen, but you can also'
			[312] link 'retrieve them as an RSS feed', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/help/user/search/index.md#retrieve-search-results-as-feed'
			StaticText '.'
		[313] heading 'Filter merge requests by ID'
		[315] blockquote ''
			[316] paragraph ''
				[317] link 'Introduced', url='https://gitlab.com/gitlab-org/gitlab-foss/-/issues/39908'
				StaticText 'in GitLab 12.1.'
		[318] paragraph ''
			StaticText 'You can filter the'
			[319] strong ''
				StaticText 'Merge Request'
			StaticText 'list to find merge requests by their ID.'
		[320] paragraph ''
			StaticText 'For example, enter filter'
			[321] code ''
				StaticText '#30'
			StaticText 'to return only merge request 30.'
		[322] heading 'Filter merge requests by approvers (PREMIUM)'
			[324] strong ''
				StaticText '(PREMIUM)'
		[325] blockquote ''
			[326] paragraph ''
				StaticText 'Moved to GitLab Premium in 13.9.'
		[327] paragraph ''
			StaticText 'To filter merge requests by an individual eligible approver ('
			[328] link 'Code owner', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/help/user/project/code_owners.md'
			StaticText '), you can type (or select from the dropdown list)'
			[329] strong ''
				StaticText 'Approver'
			StaticText 'and select the user.'
		[330] paragraph ''
			[331] link 'Filter MRs by an approver', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/help/user/project/merge_requests/img/filter_approver_merge_requests_v14_6.png'
				[332] image 'Filter MRs by an approver', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/help/user/project/merge_requests/img/filter_approver_merge_requests_v14_6.png'
		[333] heading 'Filter merge requests by "approved by" (PREMIUM)'
			[335] strong ''
				StaticText '(PREMIUM)'
		[336] blockquote ''
			[337] list ''
				[338] listitem ''
					ListMarker '•'
					[339] link 'Introduced', url='https://gitlab.com/gitlab-org/gitlab/-/merge_requests/30335'
					StaticText 'in GitLab 13.0.'
				[340] listitem ''
					ListMarker '•'
					StaticText 'Moved to GitLab Premium in 13.9.'
		[341] paragraph ''
			StaticText 'To filter merge requests already approved by a specific individual, you can type (or select from the dropdown list)'
			[342] strong ''
				StaticText 'Approved-By'
			StaticText 'and select the user.'
		[343] paragraph ''
			[344] link 'Filter MRs by approved by', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/help/user/project/merge_requests/img/filter_approved_by_merge_requests_v14_6.png'
				[345] image 'Filter MRs by approved by', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/help/user/project/merge_requests/img/filter_approved_by_merge_requests_v14_6.png'
		[346] heading 'Filter merge requests by reviewer'
		[348] blockquote ''
			[349] paragraph ''
				[350] link 'Introduced', url='https://gitlab.com/gitlab-org/gitlab/-/merge_requests/47605'
				StaticText 'in GitLab 13.7.'
		[351] paragraph ''
			StaticText 'To filter review requested merge requests for a specific individual, you can type (or select from the dropdown list)'
			[352] strong ''
				StaticText 'Reviewer'
			StaticText 'and select the user.'
		[353] heading 'Filter merge requests by environment or deployment date'
		[355] blockquote ''
			[356] paragraph ''
				[357] link 'Introduced', url='https://gitlab.com/gitlab-org/gitlab/-/merge_requests/44041'
				StaticText 'in GitLab 13.6.'
		[358] paragraph ''
			StaticText 'To filter merge requests by deployment data, such as the environment or a date, you can type (or select from the dropdown list) the following:'
		[359] list ''
			[360] listitem ''
				ListMarker '•'
				StaticText 'Environment'
			[361] listitem ''
				ListMarker '•'
				StaticText 'Deployed-before'
			[362] listitem ''
				ListMarker '•'
				StaticText 'Deployed-after'
		[363] paragraph ''
			StaticText 'NOTE: Projects using a'
			[364] link 'fast-forward merge method', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/help/user/project/merge_requests/methods/index.md#fast-forward-merge'
			StaticText 'do not return results, as this method does not create a merge commit.'
		[365] paragraph ''
			StaticText 'When filtering by an environment, a dropdown list presents all environments that you can choose from:'
		[366] paragraph ''
			[367] link 'Filter MRs by their environment', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/help/user/project/merge_requests/img/filtering_merge_requests_by_environment_v14_6.png'
				[368] image 'Filter MRs by their environment', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/help/user/project/merge_requests/img/filtering_merge_requests_by_environment_v14_6.png'
		[369] paragraph ''
			StaticText 'When filtering by'
			[370] code ''
				StaticText 'Deployed-before'
			StaticText 'or'
			[371] code ''
				StaticText 'Deployed-after'
			StaticText ', the date refers to when the deployment to an environment (triggered by the merge commit) completed successfully. You must enter the deploy date manually. Deploy dates use the format'
			[372] code ''
				StaticText 'YYYY-MM-DD'
			StaticText ', and must be quoted if you wish to specify both a date and time ('
			[373] code ''
				StaticText '"YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM"'
			StaticText '):'
		[374] paragraph ''
			[375] link 'Filter MRs by a deploy date', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/help/user/project/merge_requests/img/filtering_merge_requests_by_date_v14_6.png'
				[376] image 'Filter MRs by a deploy date', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/help/user/project/merge_requests/img/filtering_merge_requests_by_date_v14_6.png'
		[377] heading 'Add changes to a merge request'
		[379] paragraph ''
			StaticText 'If you have permission to add changes to a merge request, you can add your changes to an existing merge request in several ways, depending on the complexity of your change and whether you need access to a development environment:'
		[380] list ''
			[381] listitem ''
				ListMarker '•'
				[382] link 'Edit changes in the Web IDE', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/help/user/project/web_ide/index.md'
				StaticText 'in your browser with the'
				StaticText '.'
				[384] link 'keyboard shortcut', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/help/user/shortcuts.md'
				StaticText '. Use this browser-based method to edit multiple files, or if you are not comfortable with Git commands. You cannot run tests from the Web IDE.'
			[385] listitem ''
				ListMarker '•'
				[386] link 'Edit changes in Gitpod', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/help/integration/gitpod.md#launch-gitpod-in-gitlab'
				StaticText ', if you need a fully-featured environment to both edit files, and run tests afterward. Gitpod supports running the'
				[387] link 'GitLab Development Kit (GDK)', url='https://gitlab.com/gitlab-org/gitlab-development-kit'
				StaticText '. To use Gitpod, you must'
				[388] link 'enable Gitpod in your user account', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/help/integration/gitpod.md#enable-gitpod-in-your-user-settings'
				StaticText '.'
			[389] listitem ''
				ListMarker '•'
				[390] link 'Push changes from the command line', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/help/gitlab-basics/start-using-git.md'
				StaticText ', if you are familiar with Git and the command line.'
		[391] heading 'Assign a user to a merge request'
		[393] paragraph ''
			StaticText 'To assign the merge request to a user, use the'
			[394] code ''
				StaticText '/assign @user'
			StaticText ''
			[395] link 'quick action', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/help/user/project/quick_actions.md#issues-merge-requests-and-epics'
			StaticText 'in a text area in a merge request, or:'
		[396] list ''
			[397] listitem ''
				ListMarker '0.'
				StaticText 'On the top bar, select'
				[398] strong ''
					StaticText 'Main menu > Projects'
				StaticText 'and find your project.'
			[399] listitem ''
				ListMarker '0.'
				StaticText 'On the left sidebar, select'
				[400] strong ''
					StaticText 'Merge requests'
				StaticText 'and find your merge request.'
			[401] listitem ''
				ListMarker '0.'
				StaticText 'On the right sidebar, expand the right sidebar and locate the'
				[402] strong ''
					StaticText 'Assignees'
				StaticText 'section.'
			[403] listitem ''
				ListMarker '0.'
				StaticText 'Select'
				[404] strong ''
					StaticText 'Edit'
				StaticText '.'
			[405] listitem ''
				ListMarker '0.'
				StaticText 'Search for the user you want to assign, and select the user.'
		[406] paragraph ''
			StaticText "The merge request is added to the user's assigned merge request list."
		[407] heading 'Assign multiple users (PREMIUM)'
			[409] strong ''
				StaticText '(PREMIUM)'
		[410] blockquote ''
			[411] paragraph ''
				StaticText 'Moved to GitLab Premium in 13.9.'
		[412] paragraph ''
			StaticText 'GitLab enables multiple assignees for merge requests, if multiple people are accountable for it:'
		[413] paragraph ''
			[414] link 'multiple assignees for merge requests sidebar', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/help/user/project/merge_requests/img/multiple_assignees_for_merge_requests_sidebar.png'
				[415] image 'multiple assignees for merge requests sidebar', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/help/user/project/merge_requests/img/multiple_assignees_for_merge_requests_sidebar.png'
		[416] paragraph ''
			StaticText 'To assign multiple assignees to a merge request, use the'
			[417] code ''
				StaticText '/assign @user'
			StaticText ''
			[418] link 'quick action', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/help/user/project/quick_actions.md#issues-merge-requests-and-epics'
			StaticText 'in a text area, or:'
		[419] list ''
			[420] listitem ''
				ListMarker '0.'
				StaticText 'On the top bar, select'
				[421] strong ''
					StaticText 'Main menu > Projects'
				StaticText 'and find your project.'
			[422] listitem ''
				ListMarker '0.'
				StaticText 'On the left sidebar, select'
				[423] strong ''
					StaticText 'Merge requests'
				StaticText 'and find your merge request.'
			[424] listitem ''
				ListMarker '0.'
				StaticText 'On the right sidebar, expand the right sidebar and locate the'
				[425] strong ''
					StaticText 'Assignees'
				StaticText 'section.'
			[426] listitem ''
				ListMarker '0.'
				StaticText 'Select'
				[427] strong ''
					StaticText 'Edit'
				StaticText 'and, from the dropdown list, select all users you want to assign the merge request to.'
		[428] paragraph ''
			StaticText 'To remove an assignee, clear the user from the same dropdown list.'
		[429] heading 'Close a merge request'
		[431] paragraph ''
			StaticText 'If you decide to permanently stop work on a merge request, GitLab recommends you close the merge request rather than'
			[432] link 'delete it', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/help/user/project/merge_requests/index.md#delete-a-merge-request'
			StaticText '. The author and assignees of a merge request, and users with Developer, Maintainer, or Owner'
			[433] link 'roles', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/help/user/permissions.md'
			StaticText 'in a project can close merge requests in the project:'
		[434] list ''
			[435] listitem ''
				ListMarker '0.'
				StaticText 'Go to the merge request you want to close.'
			[436] listitem ''
				ListMarker '0.'
				StaticText 'Scroll to the comment box at the bottom of the page.'
			[437] listitem ''
				ListMarker '0.'
				StaticText 'Following the comment box, select'
				[438] strong ''
					StaticText 'Close merge request'
				StaticText '.'
		[439] paragraph ''
			StaticText 'GitLab closes the merge request, but preserves records of the merge request, its comments, and any associated pipelines.'
		[440] heading 'Delete a merge request'
		[442] paragraph ''
			StaticText 'GitLab recommends you close, rather than delete, merge requests.'
		[443] paragraph ''
			StaticText 'WARNING: You cannot undo the deletion of a merge request.'
		[444] paragraph ''
			StaticText 'To delete a merge request:'
		[445] list ''
			[446] listitem ''
				ListMarker '0.'
				StaticText 'Sign in to GitLab as a user with the project Owner role. Only users with this role can delete merge requests in a project.'
			[447] listitem ''
				ListMarker '0.'
				StaticText 'Go to the merge request you want to delete, and select'
				[448] strong ''
					StaticText 'Edit'
				StaticText '.'
			[449] listitem ''
				ListMarker '0.'
				StaticText 'Scroll to the bottom of the page, and select'
				[450] strong ''
					StaticText 'Delete merge request'
				StaticText '.'
		[451] heading 'Update merge requests when target branch merges (FREE SELF)'
			[453] strong ''
				StaticText '(FREE SELF)'
		[454] blockquote ''
			[455] list ''
				[456] listitem ''
					ListMarker '•'
					[457] link 'Introduced', url='https://gitlab.com/gitlab-org/gitlab/-/issues/320902'
					StaticText 'in GitLab 13.9.'
				[458] listitem ''
					ListMarker '•'
					[459] link 'Disabled on self-managed', url='https://gitlab.com/gitlab-org/gitlab/-/issues/320902'
					StaticText 'in GitLab 13.9.'
				[460] listitem ''
					ListMarker '•'
					[461] link 'Enabled on self-managed', url='https://gitlab.com/gitlab-org/gitlab/-/issues/320895'
					StaticText 'GitLab 13.10.'
		[462] paragraph ''
			StaticText 'Merge requests are often chained together, with one merge request depending on the code added or changed in another merge request. To support keeping individual merge requests small, GitLab can update up to four open merge requests when their target branch merges into'
			[463] code ''
				StaticText 'main'
			StaticText '. For example:'
		[464] list ''
			[465] listitem ''
				ListMarker '•'
				[466] strong ''
					StaticText 'Merge request 1'
				StaticText ': merge'
				[467] code ''
					StaticText 'feature-alpha'
				StaticText 'into'
				[468] code ''
					StaticText 'main'
				StaticText '.'
			[469] listitem ''
				ListMarker '•'
				[470] strong ''
					StaticText 'Merge request 2'
				StaticText ': merge'
				[471] code ''
					StaticText 'feature-beta'
				StaticText 'into'
				[472] code ''
					StaticText 'feature-alpha'
				StaticText '.'
		[473] paragraph ''
			StaticText 'If these merge requests are open at the same time, and merge request 1 ('
			[474] code ''
				StaticText 'feature-alpha'
			StaticText ') merges into'
			[475] code ''
				StaticText 'main'
			StaticText ', GitLab updates the destination of merge request 2 from'
			[476] code ''
				StaticText 'feature-alpha'
			StaticText 'to'
			[477] code ''
				StaticText 'main'
			StaticText '.'
		[478] paragraph ''
			StaticText 'Merge requests with interconnected content updates are usually handled in one of these ways:'
		[479] list ''
			[480] listitem ''
				ListMarker '•'
				StaticText 'Merge request 1 is merged into'
				[481] code ''
					StaticText 'main'
				StaticText 'first. Merge request 2 is then retargeted to'
				[482] code ''
					StaticText 'main'
				StaticText '.'
			[483] listitem ''
				ListMarker '•'
				StaticText 'Merge request 2 is merged into'
				[484] code ''
					StaticText 'feature-alpha'
				StaticText '. The updated merge request 1, which now contains the contents of'
				[485] code ''
					StaticText 'feature-alpha'
				StaticText 'and'
				[486] code ''
					StaticText 'feature-beta'
				StaticText ', is merged into'
				[487] code ''
					StaticText 'main'
				StaticText '.'
		[488] paragraph ''
			StaticText 'This feature works only when a merge request is merged. Selecting'
			[489] strong ''
				StaticText 'Remove source branch'
			StaticText 'after merging does not retarget open merge requests. This improvement is'
			[490] link 'proposed as a follow-up', url='https://gitlab.com/gitlab-org/gitlab/-/issues/321559'
			StaticText '.'
		[491] heading 'Move sidebar actions'
		[493] blockquote ''

step_data.thought: I'm now on the Merge requests documentation page, which is exactly what I was looking for. This page provides an overview of merge requests in GitLab, including what they are, how to view them, filter them, and various workflows. However, I specifically need to find information about *creating* merge requests, which isn't the main focus of this current page.\n\nLooking at the 'Related topics' section near the bottom of the page, I can see a link titled 'Create a merge request' with ID 556. This is exactly what I need - documentation specifically about creating merge requests. I'll click on this link to access that information.
